verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How great are You, Lord How great is Your mercy How great are the things That You have done for me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How great are You, Lord Your lovingkindness Is filling my heart as I sing How great are You, Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How great is Your love It reaches to the heavens How great is the heart That sought and rescued me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How great are You, Lord Your lovingkindness Is filling my heart as I sing How great are You, Lord.{/lang-eng}
